summary: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.
cast: Irrfan Khan|Tabu|Pankaj Kapur|Naseeruddin Shah|Om Puri|Piyush Mishra|Masumeh Makhija|Ajay Gehi|Abbas Tyrewala|Deepak Dobriyal|Gyanchand Rikki|Manav Kaushik|Ankur Vikal|Pubali Sanyal|Raj|Murli Sharma|Firdous Irani|Vivek Mishra|Shammi Narang|Mohini Mathur|Rakesh Pandit|Sabir Khan|Musharraf Khan|Jaywant Wadkar|Jitendra Shriamali|Bhupinder Sharma|Jagdish Kansara|Shweta Menon|Vinay Shukla|Rajeev Acharya|Anoop Joshi|Ramratan Sen|Shankar Nihate|Dibyendu Bhattacharya|Nadeem Khan|Sanjay Bhutiani|Richa Nayer|Daya Shankar Pandey|Vinod Nahardih|Anurag Kashyap
title: Maqbool
